entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 60
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
